title: Grading system for ARAM?
body: In this game, I went 29/1/27 as Tristana. I got an A+. Is this not an S-quality game? Granted, it's ARAM, but isn't this worthy of at least an S-? I'm new to this game, so I don't know if I needed to have done better.

replies.body: An A+ is a pretty solid score, but ARAM is pretty cutthroat.  Champions like Tristana can perform very well in ARAM, and a lot of players may have had even better games.  More info is also available in our [champion mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) guide.  While it may not have been an S this time, don't discredit yourself from a really good performance!
